extendedInfo.description: Tracksterâ¢ is a revolutionary and inexpensive GPS based application that works on Android and iPhone, utilizing Google Maps. Tracksterâ¢ allows you to track, find and follow your family, friends and employees who also download the Tracksterâ¢ app to their smartphones. If you want to know where your employees, family or friends are, find them instantly with Tracksterâ¢. PARENT -  Tracksterâ¢ allows you to track and follow your kids throughout the day. Tracksterâ¢ allows your kids to check in without calling to let you know they have arrived at a specific location and again, when they leave. It's an app that the whole family will value and enjoy for just pennies a day.EMPLOYER - If you're an employer, Tracksterâ¢ allows you to track and find your employees in the field, ensuring that they are at the proper location and detailing how much time they spend at each location. It also supports detailed downloadable reporting. Tracksterâ¢ enables employers to efficiently re-route employees to emergency appointments and calls increasing efficiency, productivity and profits. All of this at a fraction of the price you'll find with similar apps with much less functionality. FRIENDS - Download the Tracksterâ¢ app to your smartphone, enter your email address and a password to load the app, and see yourself and other Tracksterâ¢ users in minutes! Want to invite other friends? Send an email through FB, Twitter, Gmail or Outlook. Tracksterâ¢ works on all smartphones.Tracksterâ¢ is the easiest way to stay connected. Whether you are at school, grabbing a bite to eat, headed to a party or checking out a movie or concert, youâre always connected to your âfriendsâ group via their pinpoints on a Google map.  Send a text, connect to FB or send a tweet right from the Tracksterâ¢ app.   Check in at your favorite location, or let Tracksterâ¢ automatically record your location at a predetermined interval that you choose.  For just $1.99 per month, your smartphone and computer can be turned into a full-featured tracking monitor.  Youâll know where your family, friends and employees are for just pennies a day.  Have questions?  Visit our website today at http://www.tracksterapp.com or call our customer service department - 800.216.9130.

reviews.title: Don\'t install this app if you own a GS3
reviews.comment: This app isn\'t working at all on my phone. I want my money back.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for tracking my employees and family
reviews.comment: I use Trackster with my guys to know where they are and have been and to allow them to clock in and out of jobs. I also put it on my kids phones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tracking and dispatching employees simple
reviews.comment: My service techs can clock in and out of jobs.  I can see where they are and where theyve been.  I can also see who closest to a new service call
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing app!!
reviews.comment: Great app, I can now easily see where my friends and family are and post status updates to Facebook right in the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on galaxy nexus
reviews.comment: I love the concept of this app. Totally worth 5 stars if it didn\'t force close on ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Makes tracking friends and family easy. Trackster lets me see where my friends and family are and where they have been. I can even do status updates on Facebook through this!
reviews.author: A Google User
